for layering between seasons adding an extra touch of style to your outfits here are some characteristics of the pattern - intermediate crochet pattern written in us terms - photos of main steps included - the vest is worked bottom up in two panels one back panel and one front panel the finishing of collar and armholes are crocheted onto the body once it s sewn - the sample in the picture is
